column5: Hey folks, I know we have loads of talent on the board and was hoping to once again tap into it   Fishing for Tyler has really grown as you all know, and I hope it continues to for a long time, that being the case I think it's time it had it's own logo instead of continuing to use the OFC logo, I think TJ will agree.  I have a pretty good idea of what I want, what I don't have is the skill or tools to create it.  If there is anyone here that is willing and able to help me with this I would greatly appreciate it.  Maureen
